## ExpectInterface.numberCloseTo() method

Matches numbers that are close to the target value. The options are used to specify the maximum difference.

The range is \[expected - delta, expected + delta\] (inclusive).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
numberCloseTo(target: number, options: {
        delta: number;
    }): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | number | a number to aim for. |
|  options | { delta: number; } | an object with the delta parameter, denoting the maximum difference between the values. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
